text.section: The secretary, the cabinet, the commission, its personnel, or organization and funds shall constitute a continuation of the analogous provisions of the previous unemployment compensation laws of this state and the provisions of this chapter shall be considered as substituted in a continuing way for the provisions of such laws. Nothing in this chapter shall waive any payments required of any employer under any such laws.
No vested right shall exist against amendment or repeal of any part of this chapter.

law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 105. -- Amended 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 206, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 4748g-19, 4748g-20.
